p: Intraperitoneal injection of DOX to rats resulted in significant ( p < 0.05, p < 0.001, and p < 0.0001) decreased activities of SOD, CAT, GPx, GST, and GSH levels while significantly increasing ( p < 0.001) MDA activities ( Table 7). However, oral pretreatment with IGESE significantly ( p < 0.05, p < 0.001, and p < 0.0001) attenuated the alterations in the activities of these cardiac tissue enzyme markers. Similarly, IGESE pretreatment significantly ( p < 0.001 and p < 0.0001) and dose dependently reduced MDA levels ( Table 7).
